name: Lone Star
desc: Playing with lines and randomness using p5.js and canvas API. Yet another attempt to _Code like no one's watching_

name: The Way We Move
desc: Let's play with canvas drawing and WebAudio API, see if something interesting might appear. A first attempt to Code like no one's watching.

name: Prettyprint Bookmarklet
desc: A small bookmarklet to apply google-code-prettify syntax highlighting to any in-browser raw code.

name: Grunt-wkhtmltopdf
desc: Grunt Task that uses wkhtmltopdf to convert HTML files to PDF

name: Static Templater
desc: A grunt-based command line tool to render HTML and PDF from JSON and HTML templates

name: Testing Dailymotion Video Player
desc: A basic test page for Dailymotion Video Player
